resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

As artists ourselves, we understand firsthand the difficulties that come with art block. There can be stress in teh most mundane things about creating art. Our team wanted to challenge artists\' creativity to bloom their potential and challenge artists\' creativity to conquer this obstacle. From there, we formed Craftyly and decided on a simple and important mission: empowering artists to bloom their potential and challenge their potential.
The app was created by Tiffany Trinh and Michelle Xu, two high school students in their junior year of high school.
Special thanks to: Skye Kim who guided us and provided valuable feedback throughout the development of the app
Thank you to those who tested the prototype of our app (:
